meanings.sent1: After the storm, they decided to rebury the old bones in a safer place.
meanings.sent2: The family chose to rebury their beloved pet in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The ghost whispered, 'Please don't rebury me again, I need to haunt this place!'
meanings.sent4: The memories of the past were too painful to rebury, so they kept them close.
meanings.sent5: The villagers gathered to rebury the ancient artifacts, preserving their history.

meanings.sent1: The archaeologists had to rebury the mummy after studying it.
meanings.sent2: It was a solemn occasion as they reburied the fallen soldiers with full military honors.
meanings.sent3: The zombie joked, 'If you rebury me, make sure to put a 'Do Not Disturb' sign.'
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the past were too dangerous to rebury, so they remained exposed.
meanings.sent5: The ancient king's tomb was reburied with great ceremony, honoring his legacy.
